txt.en: Renfaer has asked you to collect hides as a parting gift of good will towards the Men of Stangard, on behalf of Noriel.

'Though the Men of Stangard are not allowed in these woods, their trespass has caused no lasting harm. I wish to make them a gift of neighbourly good will.\n\n'Please gather hides from the beasts of the forests, so that the Rohirrim may craft clothes and blankets to ward against the cold.'
Hides can be found on the bears and deer of Thinglad.\n\nYou should collect hides from beasts you encounter to use as a gift for the Rohirrim.
'Ah, thank you, [placeholder] -- you have done well, once again.\n\n'These should make a suitable parting gift to the Rohirrim before they fulfill their banishment from Thinglad.'
Renfaer is near the centre of Thinglad.\n\nYou should bring the hides you gathered to Renfaer.
Raenfer is near the centre of Thinglad.\n\nYou should bring the hides you gathered to Raenfer.
'You want to head south before you begin your hunt, and find the scout who keeps watch there.'
'Ah, thank you, [placeholder] -- you have done well, once again.\n\n'These should make a suitable parting gift to the Horse-riders before they fulfill their banishment from Thinglad.'
A Parting Gift of Good Will
